= GOGS 一款极易搭建的自助 Git 服务=

https://gogs.io/

https://github.com/gogits/gogs

用来取代 github, gitlab

下载后解压即可用

可以使用本地 sqlite 做数据库, 并使用自带的 ssh, 基本无依赖, 部署方便.

为了使用 22 端口 建议用 setcap 工具设置程序属性.

=== 配置参考 ===
{{{
APP_NAME = Gogs
RUN_USER = git
RUN_MODE = prod

[database]
DB_TYPE  = sqlite3
PATH     = data/gogs.db

[repository]
ROOT = ../gogs-repositories

[server]
DOMAIN           = gogs.tyio.net
HTTP_PORT        = 63000
ROOT_URL         = http://gogs.tyio.net/
DISABLE_SSH      = false
SSH_PORT         = 22
START_SSH_SERVER = true
OFFLINE_MODE     = true

[log]
MODE      = file
LEVEL     = Info
ROOT_PATH = log
}}}

=== nginx ===
{{{
upstream gogs {
    server localhost6:63000;
    keepalive 16;
}

server {
    server_name  gogs.*;
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://gogs;
    }
}
}}}
